title: Strategies for Forming Discussion-Based Online Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language communication skills and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Experiencing online community interaction in offline environments through smartphone-centered discussion activities

learning_goals: Learners can interact with peers three or more times per week on a smartphone-based discussion platform within two weeks.
Learners will achieve at least 80% proficiency in presenting topics and providing feedback according to structured discussion guidelines.
Learners will self-diagnose and improve their discussion participation through a peer assessment system over four weeks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
